plugins.name: document-skills
plugins.description: Collection of document processing suite including Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and PDF capabilities

plugins.name: example-skills
plugins.description: Collection of example skills demonstrating various capabilities including skill creation, MCP building, visual design, algorithmic art, internal communications, web testing, artifact building, Slack GIFs, and theme styling

plugins.name: stock-master
plugins.description: Beginner-friendly stock technical analysis tool with hybrid data sources (Yahoo Finance + Alpha Vantage MCP). Provides easy-to-understand analysis reports, buy/sell signals, Excel portfolio management, and Feishu sync. Supports US, HK, and A-share markets.
